channel.title: Comments on: One Year Off
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description:
It's my guess that the time delay is the universe having to work against our skepticism. But I think you moved through a lot of that in the past little while, so there shouldn't be quite so long now...
I send you my best, a bit of my luck, and lots happiness.
item.content:encoded:
It’s my guess that the time delay is the universe having to work against our skepticism. But I think you moved through a lot of that in the past little while, so there shouldn’t be quite so long now…

I send you my best, a bit of my luck, and lots happiness.

item.title: By: Dad
item.dc:creator: Dad
item.description:
You have the brain, the youth, and the looks to achieve whatever you want in life. Just keep thinking positively, as you are doing now, and everything will come to you.
These are my words. But, the concept is from the book: THE SCIENCE OF GETTING RICH, by Wallace D. Wattles, which I attatched in an Email to you.
Dad.
item.content:encoded:
You have the brain, the youth, and the looks to achieve whatever you want in life. Just keep thinking positively, as you are doing now, and everything will come to you.

These are my words. But, the concept is from the book: THE SCIENCE OF GETTING RICH, by Wallace D. Wattles, which I attatched in an Email to you.

Dad.
